WorkItem.Description:
I'm surprised the team hasn't started a All-In-One Code Framework category for Visual Studio LightSwitch projects.
 
Cheers,
 
--rj
WorkItem.Summary: Add a Visual Studio LightSwitch Category

Comments.Message:
Hello rj

Thank you for using our code sample request service.

LightSwitch is a good category to be added into All-In-One Code Framework. We will start to add LightSwtich code samples when LightSwitch is RTMed. 

If you have any *specific* code sample topics about LightSwitch, you are welcome to submit them here. 

I hope that you have a wonderful day!

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework.
